Hi,
I started with Heritrix and i'm facing a problem.
I try to crawl a webs=
ite wich holds some flash animation  and i always 
end up with JRE error
"j=
 
com.anotherbigidea.flash.readers.ActionParser.createRecords(Lcom/another\=

bigidea/io/InStream;)Ljava/util/Vector;"
I don't know how to fix this prob=
lem. Is it related to the SWFExtractor
module ? Should i disable it, in ord=
er  that my crawl ends normally ?

Thanks.
